info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 26 at 4:37AM EDT until August 27 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Waves of 2 to 4 feet building to 3 to 5 feet early this morning, then diminishing to 2 to 4 feet overnight tonight. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte county. In Michigan, Berrien county. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
